CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. EURODIF S.A., ET AL.; and USEC INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. EURODIF S.A., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER IN NO. 07-1059
ORAL ARGUMENT OF H. BARTOW FARR ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS IN NO. 07-1078
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CAITLIN J. HALLIGAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER IN NO. 07-1059
(Whereupon, at 12:07 p.m. the case was submitted.)
